price: 15. Markaad ku gaddonteen (qadafkaa) carrabyadiinna8, oo aad ka laheydeen afafkiinnna wax aydaan ogeyn, waxaadna mooddeen arrin fudud, halka Alle agtiis ay aheyd wax daran.
arabic: إِذۡ تَلَقَّوۡنَهُۥ بِأَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَتَقُولُونَ بِأَفۡوَاهِكُم مَّا لَيۡسَ لَكُم بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَتَحۡسَبُونَهُۥ هَيِّنٗا وَهُوَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمٞ
footnotes: 8. Halkaad ku maqli lahaydeen dhegahiinna macnaha waa idinkoo aan ka fekerin waxa aad maqasheen oo u fiirsan bal u degdegay inaad iska sheegsheegtaan warkaa been abuurka ah idinkoo aan tixgelin waxa aad leedihiin oo ku hadleysaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh talaqqawnahu bi-alsinatikum wataqūlūna bi-afwāhikum mā laysa lakum bihi ʿil'mun wataḥsabūnahu hayyinan wahuwa ʿinda al-lahi ʿaẓīmun
